field.name: prodSpecId
field.remark: An identification number assigned to uniquely identify the specification.

field.name: typeId
field.remark: product specification type ID value： 0：(Atomic Product Specification) 1：(Composite Product Specification)

field.name: name
field.remark: The name of the product specification.

field.name: description
field.remark: Description information to explain what is product specification.

field.name: lifecycleStatus
